snippet: The visit, planned for just before Thanksgiving, will be the first by an American president and is part of a new policy of openness toward Myanmar.
abstract: Pres Obama will visit Myanmar as part of trip to Asia; visit will be first by American president and part of new policy of openness toward country; trip is intended to underscore Obama's desire to reorient American foreign policy toward the Pacific and counter rising Chinese aggression by engaging its neighbors.

byline.contributor: Helene Cooper contributed reporting from Washington, and Thomas Fuller from Bangkok.

lead_paragraph: The visit, planned for just before Thanksgiving, will be the first by an American president and is part of a new policy of openness toward Myanmar.

headline.main: Obama to Visit Myanmar as Part of First Postelection Overseas Trip to Asia
headline.print_headline: Obama to Visit Myanmar as Part of First Postelection Overseas Trip to Asia

keywords.value: Far East, South and Southeast Asia and Pacific Areas
keywords.name: glocations
